Literature.Title: New Peptides from The Marine-Derived Fungi Aspergillus allahabadii and Aspergillus ochraceopetaliformis.
Literature.Author: Hwang JY, Lee JH, Park SC, Lee J, Oh DC, Oh KB, Shin J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 19433(MIC=>128µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 19434(MIC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>128µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>128µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10031(MIC=>128µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=>128µg/ml),Aspergillus fumigatus HIC 6094(MIC=>128µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=>128µg/ml),Trichophyton mentagrophytes IFM 40996(MIC=>128µg/ml),Trichophyton rubrum NBRC 9185(MIC=>128µg/ml)
